item.description:
Time for another cookout at Salem Willows, and what better weekend than the weekend that Salem Willows is celebrating their Heritage Days.

This time we will handle the cookout a little different.  THIS WILL BE A SIDE DISH POT LUCK COOKOUT.  The grill will be available for everyone to use, so bring your own burger, hot dog, chicken, sausage to cook.  Also bring a Salad, munchies, dessert or something to share with the group.

Please include in your RSVP the item you will be bringing to share with the group.

 

We will meet at the location of the July 3rd cookout, have a nice cookout lunch, sit n chat, walk around the Heritage Days events and all are welcome to stick around for the beautiful sunset that this area provides.

 

Rain will cancel this event, so check the site prior to leaving if the weather is questionable.

Please bring the Meetup Cellphone number with you so that if you are running late, get lost or can't find us you can call the organizers.

Remember if you have not paid your dues this year, please consider paying them at this event.

We hope to see you all at The Willows

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Across from the Tennis Courts on the Water side at the top of the Hill
item.name: Heritage Days Cookout at Salem Willows
